summary: This is an email chain from December 1, 2020, regarding a request from FBI Squad C-20 for agent assistance in the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The request is for agents to show digital discovery evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell, the subject of the investigation. The email discusses showing digital discovery evidence to her and her defense team at MDC.

events.title: Discovery Review at MDC
events.description: FBI agents from Squad C-20 were scheduled to show digital discovery evidence (via laptop and hard drive) to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 was actively involved in the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation as of late 2020.
The investigation involved digital evidence that required presentation to the defense team.
A specific logistical plan was made for agents to show this evidence at the MDC on November 6, 2020.
The email chain indicates coordination within the FBI's New York office regarding resource allocation for the case.
